frontmatter.title: Announcing UVA Press Author's Corner!
frontmatter.description: Welcome to the UVA Press Author's Corner! Here, we feature conversations with the authors of our latest releases to provide a glimpse into the writer's mind, their book's main lessons, and what’s next for them. We hope you enjoy these inside stories. We're beginning the series with a conversation with Rex Bowman and Carlos Santos, coauthors of [ALMOST HEMINGWAY: The Adventures of Negley Farson, Foreign Correspondent,](https://www.upress.virginia.edu/title/5722) out today (August 31).
